<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Everyone's a Suspect](/Feats.aspx?ID=1481) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=318" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 65 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You are so suspicious of everyone you meet that you keep mental notes on how to defeat them all—even your own allies. After interacting with a creature for at least 1 minute, you automatically [Pursue a Lead](/Actions.aspx?ID=544) with that creature as the subject. You can have any number of such leads at any given time, and when you Pursue a Lead again, you don't give up any of these automatic subjects.
name: Everyone's a Suspect
